entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:53 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3 except minus 7 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 3 except minus 7 inland. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning in the morning then changing to rain near noon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 50 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Windy. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 23 December 2022
